title: Decreasing current in wire induces emf in loops

content.question: If the current in the wire is decreasing, what is the direction of the induced current, if any, in each of the loops?

choices.label: Loop X Loop Y Counterclockwise Clockwise
Loop X Loop Y Counterclockwise Counterclockwise
Loop X Loop Y Clockwise Counterclockwise
Loop X Loop Y Clockwise Clockwise
Loop X Loop Y None None

content.answer: Loop X Loop Y Counterclockwise Clockwise

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
